name: CoronaRoids
description:
The year is 2020, and a life-threatening pandemic has spread around the world, risking people’s lives every day. The death count keeps rising, will you be the next victim?

 remember to wash hands and keep sanitize, together we can get through this.

Now for the game!

Disclaimer, this game was meant for fun only and not a serious project, unless people enjoy it enough, and for now none profit.

Humanity have found a way to fight this deadly virus, by creating a micro droid that gets injected into the body to help fend off the virus for good.

The only problem is you need to control the drone to kill the nasty virus in this fun but simple asteroids clone with a twist.

arrow keys to move shift to slow down space to fire
